column5: Hey all, my names bill and i live in near orangville.  I'm new to the site and would like to say hi.  I fly fish and and go steelheading alot and i bring my son with me some times.  I am curios if the notty will still be too high too fish on monday.  Any suggestions would be appreciated.  thanks, bill

The lower section that has a open season would be very high and likely have dangerous ice along the shore. I however have not seen it in the last few days, I'm just going from experience and living in near by.
Welcome aboard.  Don't think I'd be going to close to any rivers in southern Ont. for a few more days.  With that rain and melt they all have to be pretty treacherous.  Cheers  Craig
Can't help you with your question but welcome to the site!
